archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0690
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Zero touch security for handsets – integrated Apple DEP and Samsung KME enrolment if required by customers

properties.value: What is expected role of BSS system? Customer needs to have Apple DEP ID, Samsung KME id (entered manually during onboarding) and this would need to be provided in the order process. Then the registration on Apple and Samsung platforms is done by Brightpoint (hardware supplier).

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
